item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：霍尼韦尔将分拆先进材料业务
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二援引知情人士的话报道，霍尼韦尔正计划分拆其先进材料业务。【原文：Honeywell is planning to spin off its Advanced Materials business, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普组织将在越南开发价值 15 亿美元的高尔夫球场和酒店项目
item.description: 越南房地产开发商金百城（KBC）周二表示，其子公司已与特朗普组织（The Trump Organization）合作，在越南北部开发一个价值 15 亿美元的高尔夫球场和酒店项目。【原文：Vietnam's real estate developer Kinhbac City (KBC) said on Tuesday that its subsidiary has partnered with The Trump Organization to develop a $1.5 billion golf course and hotel project in northern Vietnam.】

item.title: 消息人士称，现代印度公司首次公开募股将于下周以 1,865-1,960 卢比的价格开盘
item.description: 消息人士周二称，现代汽车印度公司的首次公开募股将于下周开始接受认购，定价可能在每股1865至1960卢比（22至23美元）之间，该汽车制造商的估值将高达190亿美元，这是印度今年最大的一次股票发行。【原文：Hyundai Motor India's IPO will open next week for subscriptions and will likely be priced in the range of 1,865 to 1,960 rupees ($22 to $23) per share, sources said on Tuesday, valuing the automaker at up to $19 billion in the country's biggest stock offering this year.】

item.title: 美联储主席库格勒：美国就业市场降温但仍有韧性
item.description: 美联储理事阿德里亚娜-库格勒（Adriana Kugler）周二在法兰克福表示，美国就业市场已开始降温，但仍具有韧性，美联储希望避免劳动力市场急剧疲软。【原文：The U.S. jobs market has started to cool but remains resilient and the Federal Reserve is keen to avoid a drastic weakening of the labor market, Fed Governor Adriana Kugler said in Frankfurt on Tuesday.】

item.title: 现代汽车为首次公开募股出售所持现代汽车印度公司 1.42 亿股股份
item.description: 现代汽车在周二提交的一份监管文件中表示，将出售其持有的现代汽车印度公司 1.42 亿股股份，用于后者的首次公开募股。【原文：Hyundai Motor said in a regulatory filing on Tuesday that it will sell 142 million shares it holds in Hyundai Motor India for the latter's initial public offering.】

item.title: Northvolt 子公司申请破产
item.description: 瑞典电池生产商 Northvolt 周二表示，该集团的一家子公司已申请破产，而资金紧张的集团其他部门仍在继续整合业务。【原文：Swedish battery maker Northvolt said on Tuesday that one of the group's subsidiaries had filed for bankruptcy, while the rest of the cash-strapped group continued to consolidate its operations.】

item.title: 美联储主席库格勒表示，如果通胀持续缓解，她支持更多降息措施
item.description: 美联储理事阿德里亚娜-库格勒（Adriana Kugler）周二表示，她坚决支持美国央行最近的降息行动，如果通胀如她预期的那样继续缓解，她将支持进一步降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Adriana Kugler said on Tuesday she strongly supported the U.S. central bank's recent interest rate cut and will support further reductions if inflation continues to ease as she expects.】

item.title: 新机构将处理欧盟用户与 Facebook、TikTok 和 YouTube 之间的纠纷
item.description: 在 Meta 平台监督委员会的支持下，一个独立机构获得了爱尔兰媒体监管机构的认证，以解决针对欧盟社交媒体公司违反政策决定的上诉。【原文：An independent body, supported by Meta Platforms' Oversight Board, has a certification from the media regulator in Ireland to resolve appeals against policy violation decisions of social media companies in the European Union.】

item.title: 沃达丰与谷歌在欧洲和非洲深化人工智能联系
item.description: 英国沃达丰公司（Vodafone）周二表示，该公司已深化了与谷歌的战略合作伙伴关系，双方达成了一项为期十年、价值超过十亿美元的协议，谷歌将为欧洲和非洲的客户提供美国科技巨头新研发的人工智能设备。【原文：Britain's Vodafone said on Tuesday it has deepened its strategic partnership with Google in a ten-year, billion dollar plus deal that would bring the U.S. tech giant's new generative AI-powered devices to customers across Europe and Africa.】

item.title: 德国 8 月工业产值增幅高于预期
item.description: 德国联邦统计局周二称，得益于汽车工业产值的增长，8 月份德国工业生产环比增长 2.9%，增幅高于预期。【原文：German industrial production rose by a larger than expected 2.9% in August from the previous month thanks to an increase in automotive industry output, the federal statistics office said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国对从欧盟进口的白兰地采取反倾销措施
item.description: 根据中国商务部的一份声明，中国周二宣布对从欧盟进口的白兰地采取临时反倾销措施，在贸易谈判持续紧张的情况下推翻了此前的举措。【原文：China on Tuesday announced provisional anti-dumping measures on brandy imports from the European Union, according to a statement from the Chinese commerce ministry, reversing an earlier move amid continued tense trade talks.】

item.title: Cryptoverse：大爆炸后无聊的比特币寻找方向
item.description: 比特币在今年年初一鸣惊人之后，在过去三个月里明显无精打采。【原文：Bitcoin has been distinctly listless in the past three months after starting the year with a bang.】

item.title: 美国的中国 ETF 大量涌入，一些投资者乐观地认为大势已去
item.description: 过去一周，当中国大陆金融市场因国定假日休市时，投资者为以中国市场为目标的美国交易所交易基金（ETF）注入了52亿美元的新资产。【原文：Investors flooded U.S.-based exchange-traded funds (ETFs) that target Chinese markets with $5.2 billion in new assets in the past week when mainland China's financial markets were shut for a national holiday, and some asset managers are hopeful the optimism will be enduring.】

item.title: 耐克举步维艰，阿迪达斯必须谨慎应对桑巴浪潮
item.description: 耐克的持续挣扎给了阿迪达斯继续从其美国竞争对手手中抢夺市场份额的机会，但这个德国品牌必须更加努力，才能让购物者对其主打产品桑巴（Samba）和瞪羚（Gazelle）梯形运动鞋感兴趣。【原文：Nike's ongoing struggles are giving Adidas a chance to keep taking market share from its larger U.S. rival, but the German brand will have to work harder to keep shoppers interested in its key Samba and Gazelle terrace sneakers.】

item.title: 早间竞价中国股市狂热被浇了一盆冷水
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：美联储主席威廉姆斯称 "随着时间推移 "应降息
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）周二在接受《金融时报》采访时表示，美国联邦储备委员会应在一段时间内降息。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve should cut interest rates over time, Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams told the Financial Times in an interview published on Tuesday.】

item.title: 德国央行行长纳格尔表示对欧洲央行再次降息持开放态度
item.description: 德国联邦银行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）告诉Table Media，他对欧洲央行在下周会议上考虑再次降息持开放态度，并补充说德国下半年的经济增长将弱于预期。【原文：Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel is open to considering another European Central Bank interest rate cut at its meeting next week, he told Table Media, adding German economic growth in the second half would be weaker than expected.】

item.title: 富士康称正在为 Nvidia 的 GB200 建设全球最大的制造工厂
item.description: 富士康的一位高级主管周二表示，富士康正在为 Nvidia 的 GB200 芯片建造世界上最大的生产设施。【原文：Foxconn is building the world's largest manufacturing facility for Nvidia's GB200 chips, a senior executive at the Taiwanese company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: LG 能源解决方案为梅赛德斯-奔驰北美分公司供应电动汽车电池
item.description: 韩国 LG Energy Solution 公司周二表示，该公司签署了一项协议，将为梅赛德斯-奔驰公司在北美和其他地区的子公司供应电动汽车电池。【原文：South Korea's LG Energy Solution said on Tuesday it signed a deal to supply electric vehicle batteries to a Mercedes-Benz affiliate in North America and other regions.】

item.title: IAM 工会称周二将继续与波音公司谈判
item.description: 国际机械师和航空航天工人协会（IAM）的成员正在波音公司举行罢工，该协会表示将在周二继续与波音公司进行谈判。【原文：The International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers (IAM), whose members are on a strike at Boeing , said that it will continue its negotiation with the planemaker on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国股市休市一周后轰然重开
item.description: 中国股市周二飙升至两年来的高点，进一步推动了强劲的涨势，因为在长达一周的假期后恢复了交易，而且投资者押注于刺激措施对经济的支持。【原文：Chinese shares soared to two-year highs on Tuesday, pushing a blistering rally even further as trade resumed after a week-long holiday and investors bet on stimulus supporting the economy.】

item.title: 交易员考虑美国利率前景，美元坚守7周高位
item.description: 周二，美元兑主要货币紧守七周高位，因为投资者在上周强劲的就业报告使大幅降息的押注落空之后，正在思考美国利率的前景，而中东紧张局势的升级则削弱了风险情绪。【原文：The dollar clung to seven-week highs against major currencies on Tuesday as investors ponder the outlook for U.S. rates after a strong jobs report last week dashed bets for large rate cuts, while escalating tensions in Middle East dented risk sentiment.】

item.title: 受中东战争风险影响，油价在升至一个多月来最高点后走低
item.description: 周二亚洲交易时段早盘，油价走低，原因是交易商在周一油价反弹至一个多月来最高点后获利了结，因为市场担心中东可能处于爆发全地区战争的边缘。【原文：Oil prices edged lower in early Asian trading hours on Tuesday as traders booked profits after prices rallied to their highest in over a month on Monday amid fears that the Middle East could be on the brink of a region-wide war.】

item.title: 路透社调查：韩国央行将于 10 月 11 日启动宽松周期，降息 25 个基点
item.description: 接受路透社调查的大多数经济学家预计，韩国央行将于周五将其关键利率下调 25 个基点至 3.25%，这将是韩国央行今年唯一一次下调利率，因为韩国央行正试图在经济增长和金融稳定之间取得平衡。【原文：The Bank of Korea will cut its key interest rate by 25 basis points to 3.25% on Friday, according to a majority of economists polled by Reuters who expect that to be the only reduction this year as it attempts to balance growth and financial stability.】

item.title: 中东冲突使市场在中国重新开放前持续紧张
item.description: 周二，全球股市开盘谨慎，油价持续走高，原因是在中国长假后万众瞩目的重新开市之前，中东冲突升级削弱了风险偏好。【原文：Global stocks began Tuesday on a cautious note while oil prices stayed elevated as the escalating conflict in the Middle East sapped risk appetite ahead of China's highly anticipated reopening after a long holiday.】

item.title: 三星第三季度利润不及预期，在人工智能芯片领域举步维艰
item.description: 三星电子（Samsung Electronics）周二预计，其第三季度营业利润将增长 274%，但低于分析师的预期，因为这家科技巨头努力利用人工智能服务器所用芯片的强劲需求。【原文：Samsung Electronics estimated on Tuesday its third-quarter operating profit jumped 274%, but that was short of analysts' estimates as the tech giant struggled to capitalise on strong demand for chips used in artificial intelligence servers.】

item.title: 夏季奖金增加后，日本实际工资再次下降，消费减少
item.description: 本周二的数据显示，日本经通胀调整后的工资在夏季红利季节连续两个月增长后，于8月份出现下降，同时家庭支出也出现下降，这使得日本央行在短期内加息的可能性大打折扣。【原文：Japan's inflation-adjusted wages fell in August after two months of increases during the summer bonus season, while household spending also declined, data showed on Tuesday, knocking chances of the central bank raising interest rates any time soon.】

item.title: 早间竞价美国利率回升，股市回落
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 美联储穆萨勒姆主张更多降息，称数据将推动宽松政策
item.description: 圣路易斯联邦储备银行行长阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆（Alberto Musalem）周一表示，随着经济在健康的道路上向前发展，他支持更多的降息措施，同时指出，央行应该谨慎行事，不要过度放宽货币政策。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis President Alberto Musalem said on Monday he supports more interest rate cuts as the economy moves forward on a healthy path, while noting that it is appropriate for the central bank to be cautious and not overdo easing monetary policy.】

item.title: Tinder 母公司 Match 任命内部人士 Steven Bailey 为新任首席财务官
item.description: Tinder 母公司 Match 集团周一任命史蒂文-贝利（Steven Bailey）为新任财务总监，接替加里-斯维德勒（Gary Swidler），于 2025 年 3 月 1 日生效。【原文：Tinder-parent Match Group on Monday named Steven Bailey as its new finance chief, effective March 1, 2025, succeeding Gary Swidler.】
